item.title: Seminar on Food Security
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: A Seminar on Food Security was organised by the Department of Education, CTA on 11 July, 2017 at TCV School, Lower Dharamsala as a part of CTA Level Science, Mathematics and Environment Exhibition – 2017. The Seminar was intended to create awareness among students and teachers about how science and technology can promote Food Security and...

item.title: Early Grade Reading workshop for primary teachers
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education, CTA has organized a five- day workshop on Early Grade Reading for primary teachers from 23rd to 27th May, 2017 in the Nyatri Hall, Gangchen Kyishong, Dharamsala. There are 23 teachers who are participating in it from different schools under various administrations namely THF, STS, TCV & CST Schools. The opening...

item.title: Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers at Tashiling, Sonada The Department of Education, CTA has kicked off the Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers in Tashiling, Sonada from 11th to 15th March, 2017 for the duration of five days. item.description: Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers at TCV, Gopalpur The Department of Education is organizing a five day workshop on Early Grade Reading for Primary Teachers in the Tibetan Language Lab of Tibetan Children’s Village Gopalpur between 9 th to 13rd October, 2016. item.title: Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers
item.dc:creator: Sherig Dragya
item.description: The Department of Education has organized Early Grade Reading Workshop for Primary Teachers at TCV Suja from 25th May to 29th May 2016. It was participated by 19 participants under the school administration of Tibetan Children Village (TCV) Dharamsala out of which 11 teachers from TCV Suja School and 8 teachers from TCV Chauntra School....
